ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:isNormativeSchema
ctl:function.ctl:description: Tests that the schema location is the normative wmts.xsd

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:allLayerLegendURLCorrectResource
ctl:function.ctl:param: WMTS Capabilities Document
ctl:function.ctl:description: Performs tests on all LegendURL to support Server.KVP.GET.GetCapabilities.Response.Layer.LegendURL.Correct.Resource and wmtsBootstrap:bootstrap.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:layerLegendURLCorrectResource
ctl:function.ctl:param: WMTS Capabilities Document
Layer in capabilities document with LegendURL
LegendURL in Layer
ctl:function.ctl:description: Performs tests on one LegendURL to support Server.KVP.GET.GetCapabilities.Response.Layer.LegendURL.Correct.Resource and wmtsBootstrap:bootstrap.

xsl:if.ctl:message: No image format found for LegendURL
Layer image format found for LegendURL does not match specified format
Layer minScaleDenominator not found for TileMatrix from any TileMatrix set for Layer.
Layer maxScaleDenominator not found for TileMatrix from any TileMatrix set for Layer.
Layer image width found for LegendURL does not match specified width
Layer image height found for LegendURL does not match specified height

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:validScaleDenominator
ctl:function.ctl:param: WMTS Capabilities Document
TileMatrixSets for Layer in capabilities document with LegendURL, as comma separated list
Scale denominator to validate for Layer
ctl:function.ctl:description: Tests whether scaleDenominator is specified in a TileMatrix for specified TileMatrixSets; returns true or false.

xsl:variable.name: isValid
xsl:variable.select: some $sd in $wmts.capabilities.doc/wmts:Contents/wmts:TileMatrixSet[some $tms in tokenize($tileMatrixSets,',') satisfies ows:Identifier = $tms]/wmts:TileMatrix/wmts:ScaleDenominator satisfies $sd = $scaleDenominator

ctl:function.name: wmts:testMenus
ctl:function.ctl:param: bootstrap document of elements containing test prerequisite check results
ctl:function.ctl:description: Presents menus of checkboxes and radio buttons for client and server tests whose prerequisites were met during bootstrap are presented for user selection.Returns a document fragment with elements that indicate selected tests.

body.h2: Compliance test suite for Web Map Tile Service (WMTS) 1.0

tr.td: Click checkboxes of test groups to execute, and radio buttons for tests within groups, then click "OK"
.....Client KVP GET tests not available - prerequisites not met

xsl:when.test: $testClientKVPGET = 'on' or $testClientKVPPOST = 'on' or $testClientXMLPOST = 'on' or $testClientSOAPPOST = 'on' or $testClientRESTful = 'on' or $testServerKVPGET = 'on' or $testServerKVPPOST = 'on' or $testServerXMLPOST = 'on' or $testServerSOAPPOST = 'on' or $testServerRESTful = 'on'

ctl:function.name: wmts:clientGetCapabilitiesAllOrNone
ctl:function.ctl:param: "true" for all or "false" for none
The HTTP service interface type: KVP.GET | KVP.POST | XML.POST | SOAP.POST (not applicable to RESTful)
ctl:function.ctl:description: Create document fragment with child elements indicating all or none Client GetCapabiliteis Tests for specified interfaceType

body.h2: Compliance test suite for Web Map Tile Service (WMTS) 1.0

tr.td: Click checkboxes of Client GetCapabilities tests to execute, then click "OK"

td.input: Services Metadata Document References Normative Schema
Services Metadata Document is Schema Valid
No Layers Response Contains Other Source URL
Layer Legend URLs are Correct Resources
Layer Legend URLs are Correct Sizes
Layer Tile Matrix Sets Are Valid
Tile Matrix Set Identifiers Are Unique
Tile Matrix Set Scale Denominators Are Unique
Tile Matrix Set Well Known Scale Sets Are Compatible

Selected tests in XML

xsl:when.ctl:message: ERROR: prereq name: met prereqs does not match selected name selected no value:
